destinations.name: Radon Canyon
destinations.description: The area features nature trails, mysterious lead-plated doors, and unexplainable lights and sounds. The view is literally breathtaking.

destinations.name: Handful of Dust
destinations.description: Behold! It is dust. About a handful of it (of a small to medium man's hand, not a large man's hand, but perhaps a large woman's and maybe even a very large woman's). Wow! Please come visit. Please. Please. Please. Please. Please.

destinations.name: Hole in the Vacant Lot Out Back of Ralph's
destinations.description: Come here and nestle with us. Nestle with us for the low-low price. Act today. Or tomorrow. Not Wednesday.

destinations.name: Monolith
destinations.description: A controversial monolith with indifferent geometry and a long sharp shadow. It appeared mysteriously before Christmas. An ominous construction, channeling ancient powers and long-dead gods

destinations.name: Hysteria Land
destinations.description: Not an amusement park. A theme park. The theme of the park is amusement. At the same time, each ride is designed to remind you of the horrors of living.

destinations.name: Museum of Forbidden Technologies
destinations.description: A museum featuring numerous exhibits, all of which are covered in thick burlap at all times, with explanatory plaques completely blacked out with permanent marker. Featuring several time machines that have not been invented yet.

destinations.name: Night Vale Petting Zoo
destinations.description: A safe attraction. No ritualistic disembowelments are used to feed the emaciated wolves. Just enjoy. Please do not ask questions about the emaciated wolves nor disturb them while they devour bunnies. Family friendly fun!

destinations.name: Moonlite All-Nite Diner
destinations.description: With food that sounds good only late at night, the Moonlite All-Nite Diner is a glass box of bad food and good people!
